chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Cilia Cole, p. [5]—Pink-cheeked girl of eleven from Emond's Field. Egwene considers her a “ninny.” She likes to stare and make calf-eyes at Perrin; Egwene thinks Perrin at least ought to notice her attentions. We find out later, of course, that Cilia eventually gave Perrin his first kiss.
